message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to pay that price, and I believe it's a fair offer considering the market value.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $750000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $825000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a compromise at $795000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, and I'm confident it will be a great value for me.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, $795000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I'm counteroffering at $810000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
